-- | A package allowing to write Hakyll blog posts in Rmd
--   
@package hakyll-R
@version 0.1.0.3

module Hakyll.Web.R
buildRmd :: Rules ()
pandocRmdCompilerWith :: ReaderOptions -> WriterOptions -> Compiler (Item String)
pandocRmdCompiler :: Compiler (Item String)
rMarkdown :: FilePath -> IO (String)
isRmd :: Item a -> Bool
saveDir :: IO a -> IO a
